headline: Q3 Earnings Roundup: Sherwin-Williams (NYSE:SHW) And The Rest Of The Building Materials Segment

headline: 2 Dow Jones Stocks to Buy Before a Potential Housing Rebound in 2025
summary: Higher interest rates have pressured home sales over the last few years, which has weighed on the performance of housing stocks.  "Homebuying momentum is building after nearly two years of suppressed home sales," said the National Association of Realtors Chief Economist Lawrence Yun.  This is after pending home sales grew 2% in October -- the third consecutive month of growth.
